page.title: 18CUSTOMS & EXCISE AT HARWICH
page.content: HARWICH IS A MAJOR PORT AND IT IS IMPORTANT TO HAVE A STRONG CUSTOMS AND EXCISE DEPARTMENT IN THE PORT. A NEW CUSTOMS HOUSE HAS BEEN BUILT IN MAIN ROAD, DOVERCOURT TO HANDLE THE PAPERWORK ACCOMPANYING THE IMPORT AND EXPORT OF SO MANY GOODS THROUGH THE PORT. THE UNIFORMED BRANCH CHECK ALL CARGO COMING INTO AND LEAVING THE COUNTRY, AS WELL AS THE PEOPLE. THEY MUST TRY TO MAKE SURE THAT NOBODY TRIES TO SMUGGLE MORE GOODS INTO THE COUNTRY THAN THEY ARE ALLOWED. THEY MUST ALSO CHECK TO STOP DRUG SMUGGLING E.G.CANNABIS AND HEROIN. WITH RABIES OFTEN OCCURRING IN EUROPE IT IS ALSO IMPORTANT THAT CUSTOMS OFFICERS PREVENT PEOPLE BRINGING ANIMALS INTO THE COUNTRY WITHOUT GOING THROUGH A PERIOD OF QUARANTINE. IN A PORT SUCH AS HARWICH THEY HAVE AN IMPORTANT JOB.
